strapiEdition.headline: Red Bull Pump Track Championship Coming to Springdale

posts.title: Springdale to Host Red Bull Pump Track Championships in 2021
posts.content:
On May 22, 2021, Springdale will host the final leg of the Red Bull UCI Pump Track World Championships circuit.

  • The region's Jones Center has a year-round ice arena, junior swimming pool, basketball court, fitness centre, indoor running track and a Velosolutions Pump Track, which hosted the first-ever Red Bull Pump Track World Championship Final in 2018. -Red Bull
  • Other destinations on the circuit include Argentina, New Zealand and China.

posts.title: Fayetteville City Council Meeting Recap
posts.content:
The Fayetteville City Council met Tuesday, Dec. 15, at 5:30pm via Zoom. The meeting was streamed live on the city's YouTube channel.

  • A Historic Preservation Grant and more were approved in a single, all-inclusive vote.
  • The full list of approvals and topics discussed can be found HERE.

posts.title: Crystal Bridges and Amazeum Seek Public Feedback for Project
posts.content:
Crystal Bridges and the Amazeum are requesting public feedback during the design phase of Convergence, an outdoor play space designed to be inclusive of individuals of all ages and abilities. -5 News

  • Inspired by arts, science and nature, Convergence will be a 4-acre public outdoor play space nestled between Crystal Bridges and the Amazeum in Bentonville.
  • A survey was created to learn how individuals in the community think they will use the space and to hear any concerns they may have. To provide anonymous feedback, fill out the survey HERE.

posts.title: Shop Vintage In Rogers This Holiday Season
posts.content:
The city of Rogers hosts a multitude of unique vintage shops, flea markets, and antique malls. When going about your holiday shopping this season, consider the 'once in a lifetime' gifts that can be found locally.

  • For a full list of vintage and antique markets in the area, click HERE.
